Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2018...
Traded from Cincinnati to Brooklyn on 5/1/2018 (Going to BRO: P Tim Zimmermann, 2B Estanis Aguilar, LF Andre Winston, 1B Frederick Wansley, P Willie Dubois. Going to CIN: P Fernando Cantu)...
Injured on 5/1/2018 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 9-10 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/15/2019...
Had first career hit on 7/5/2019, off Charles Barney (NY)...
Injured on 8/5/2019 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/2020, off Buck Gleason (SEA)...
Injured on 9/27/2020 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young in 2021, going 20-5, 2.91 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2022, going 6-0, 3.69...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2022, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,150,000 through salary arbitration...
